Subject: Problems with Heritrix webapp finding profiles and job dir
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=284768837

Hi,

I had some problems running the Heritrix webapp in another servlet  
container (Tomcat 5.5). The profiles directory wasn't found and the  
jobs directory was always created in TOMCAT_HOME/jobs ignoring the  
settings in heritrix.properties
I've added a patch that addresses these issues and also a windows  
related one which wouldn't allow job directories on another drive:
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php? 
func=detail&aid=1587413&group_id=73833&atid=539099

Regards,
Max
